Contact Sign Up

Contact Center Software built for today's Fintech leaders

Build better relationships on a platform that allows you to host secure conversations with clients, partners, and everyone that matters.

Check our solutions
Trusted by brands of all shapes and sizes

Fintech, banking, and insurance companies trust Nautilus with their communication needs. Whether you’re a startup or an established player in your field, seamless customer experiences should always be top of mind. Our Nautilus Talk (a premier web calling experience built into Zendesk) lets you achieve that and more.

Trust us to keep your data safe.

We know fully well how much your data matters to you. That’s why Nautilus utilizes AWS servers located in Singapore to ensure data locality and improved data security.

Leave the setup to us.

Tell us what you need and we’ll get you started in no time. Our solutions are easy to implement, and are managed for you. Need anything changed? Let our experts take care of that.

Keep track of your progress and call compliance metrics.

Every call made on Nautilus is automatically tracked and recorded. Download calls from our Reporting Portal for call compliance, investigation, and dispute purposes.

Individual Call recording

Maintain adherence and pinpoint coaching possibilities through the review of custom-recorded calls. In Nautilus, every call is automatically recorded and securely stored at no cost for a 90-day duration

Set performance benchmarks by identifying high performers

Get detailed agent performance reports for a comprehensive view of individual agent performance, track key metrics and improve customer service quality.

Robust monitoring and reporting to track SLA

Optimise queue management strategies with comprehensive queue reports and agent reports to allocate the best performers in the right team.

Data Security is always top of mind

Nautilus holds and maintains the following certifications to ensure that our solutions are cloud-safe and cloud ready.

Features our clients in Fintech love

Nautilus Talk
Interactive Voice Response (IVR) and Call Routing

Make sure clients find the right solutions from the right teams.

Analytics and downloadable call recordings

Track every call that comes into your system. Utilize call recordings to ensure compliance, for call disputes, and to find avenues of improvement.

Zendesk Integration

Our Nautilus Talk is a premier phone experience embedded on the Zendesk platform. Get to know important details about clients to always be a step ahead of the competition.

Enterprise-level Reporting Portal

Generate valuable metrics regarding your call distribution, service level agreement (SLA), and call volume (among others) to get a better picture of your business performance.

Agent Performance Report

Become better at managing your team by employing data-driven initiatives. Our Reporting Portal offers managers a clearer look at individual performance of every team member.

Call Journey Report

Offer better and more timely assistance when you see the entire journey a call has been on. Our call journey report traces where a call came in, how it was answered, and the last interaction.

“We chose Nautilus as our communications partner as they are the pioneers in Asterisk Technology but more importantly, we shared a vision of the future which recognises that Contact Centres need to be able to integrate multiple business processes to multiple communication channels. I will strongly recommend Nautilus to any Contact Centre setups, as Nautilus will be your key trusted communications partner in telecommunications.”

Shaun Lee
SMRT Corporation

“Nautilus implemented the setup successfully. Their soft-phone solution and overseas roaming capabilities are the main reasons we chose Nautilus as our Technology partner. They are experts in Asterisk Technology, and we continue to be impressed with the way Nautilus continues to focus on Research and Development (R&D) to bring the next generation of telephony solution into the market.”

Robert Fernandes
Certis Cisco
